Version 2.0.66 - Auto-Grade Basic SCORM & Position Bar Fixes

New Features

  • Auto-write grades to Moodle for SCORMs that don't manage their own scores (e.g. Basic SCORM)
  • Grade is calculated from furthest slide progress: (furthestSlide / totalSlides) * 100
  • Only activates when SCORM content never writes cmi.core.score.raw itself

Bug Fixes

  • Fix position bar jumping back up after backward navigation (stale interceptor returning old tag target)
  • Fix furthest slide not restored after page refresh for Basic SCORM
  • Fix initial default slide 1 overriding tag navigation target position

Changes

  • Disable lesson_location read interceptor when user navigates away from tag target
  • Track furthestSlide from forward navigation (not just from score.raw)
  • Store furthestSlide in sessionStorage for resume persistence
  • Supports both SCORM 1.2 and SCORM 2004 grade element names

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.65: Fix stale interceptor reads, furthestSlide for Basic SCORM
  • v2.0.64: Fix backward nav, faster generic detection
